attacked ?? Wow , how dramatic... It's just a fact that you will make Frank=
 mad again.
For instance: IT is very obvious that when Frank gets something=
 from the box about
stuff that says what is going to happen, YOU have to sa=
y I will add that to your predictions.
Those are not Frank's predictions, h=
e is just posting the messages, and it is very clear
that he does not like =
you saying or posting that those are his predictions.....
Maybe you should =
pick your words a little better in the future, or better yet, maybe you sho=
uld just
not say anything, and just put the info in your little files to sa=
ve, and no one would be
the wiser..
I'm tired of giving you so much time in=
 this group, so I hope I don't have to ATTACK you anymore LOL

BTW, if anyone is wondering what I am talking about, this was a good exa=
mple.
I offer a suggestion on getting things back on track with less hostil=
ity, and I am immediately attacked for making the suggestion.


--- On Tue,=
 8/24/10, Fransen, Debbie <debbie.fransen@...> wrote:

From: Fransen,=
 Debbie <debbie.fransen@...>
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] A suggestion for =
less hostility
To: "'EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com'" <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
Da=
te: Tuesday, August 24, 2010, 7:16 AM



that would be fine, if you didn't =
piss Frank off....... But you do.....
AND THAT IS NOT OKAY.....
The same th=
ing will happen when you do it again....
So what's the point in you being h=
ere.

________________________________
From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailt=
o:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of rasterer
Sent: Tuesday, August 24, =
2010 10:08 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] A suggestion f=
or less hostility



I expect none of us like all the recent attacks, insul=
ts, accusations, threats, hurting of feelings, and attempts to piss people =
off.

Can I suggest we stick to the purpose of the group: "the discussion, =
promotion, and developemnt of Electronic Voice Phenomenon, and Instrumental=
 Transcommunication methods and technologies as used in the communication w=
ith spirit, and other entities."

And that we go with Frank's philosophy "j=
ust take the approach, try different methods, see what works."

No more thr=
eats. No name calling, insults, or accusations. Just try to keep a positive=
 group attitude, be open that not everyone believes what everyone else does=
, and that's ok?






--_000_AB3E6B5188566C488E011B9C54CF2A1806126E942Csatlrccdlmb60_
